title: Total hardwood , production in Canada 2017
summary: This line graph shows the cubic meters of hardwood produced monthly in Canada 2017 .
The production of hardwood generally stays between 4300 thousand cubic meters and 5100 thousand cubic meters .
However , there was a significant drop in production April with a value of 3500 thousand cubic meters .
gold: Hardwood production in Canada for each month of 2017 . While production varied between less than 1100 cubic metres and over 1500 cubic metres in a given month , there do not seem to be any trends in the value over time .
